rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with reception area that leads to the living spaces.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-concept living room with large windows for natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining area adjacent to the living room.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with ample counter space and a ventilation hood.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional guest bathroom on ground floor for convenience.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony and ample closet space.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest room with integrated balcony for ventilation.

rooms.name: ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathroom attached to master bedroom.

rooms.name: Study/Observation Room
rooms.description: Multi-purpose space for work and relaxation with a view of the terrace.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Luxurious open terrace featuring built-in seating and vegetation areas. Ensures privacy and aligns with Vastu principles by offering an eastward extension for energy flow.

openings.description: Interior staircase connecting first floor to second floor.
